creator: American Greetings
descriptionHtml:
SmashUps are highly personalized, smile-inducing, shareable videos. Create and send funny, one-of-a-kind videos that will leave your friends and family laughing, smiling, giggling, or amazed in general merriment.

NEW Talking SmashUps! Let life-like voices and brand new characters deliver your custom message.


• Celebrity friends singing songs that are all about the special people in your life.
• Personalize with names, age, and special interests or whatever you type.
• Make SmashUps for your friends, family, co-workers, the mailman, a stranger on the train, or dog.
• Send via Text, Facebook, Twitter, Email and more!
• Subscribe to personalize and save unlimited SmashUps to your device!

Perfect for holidays and special occasions:

• Christmas
• Santa
• Winter
• Season Greetings
• Congratulations
• Anniversary
• Graduation
• Love
• Thank You
• Wedding
• Baby
• Pets
• and many more occasions for any random Thursday afternoon.


New SmashUps added regularly so check back often. So what are you waiting for? Download and start spreading some love right now!

Subscription Details:

Subscribe to SmashUps for unlimited access and sends. Who knew that making people’s day could be so inexpensive. As always, you can cancel anytime.

Your payment will be charged to your account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period, and your account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to that publication, where applicable.


Privacy Policy: https://www.smashups.com/privacy-policy.html

Terms of Service: https://www.smashups.com/terms-of-service.html

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Transform yourself and star in our NEW talking Selfie SmashUps!

title: SmashUps

creator: American Greetings
descriptionHtml:
Create and send personalized one-of-a-kind Santa videos that will leave your kids and friends laughing, smiling, giggling, or amazed in general merriment. Enter in ANY name and select from captions that are NAUGHTY or NICE and sit back and enjoy the magic of Santa delivering a unique and one-of-a-kind Christmas message.

Come back and update your SmashUp depending on how naughty or nice the recipient has been with dozens of unique creations available!


Also, NEW Talking SmashUps! Let life-like voices and brand new characters deliver your custom message.

• Celebrity friends singing songs that are all about the special people in your life.
• Personalize with names, age, and special interests or whatever you type.
• Make SmashUps for your friends, family, co-workers, the mailman, a stranger on the train, or dog.
• Send via Text, Facebook, Twitter, Email and more!
• Subscribe to personalize and save unlimited SmashUps to your device!

Perfect for holidays and special occasions:
• Christmas
• Holidays and Season’s Greetings
• Birthday
• Congratulations
• Anniversary
• Hanukkah
• Love
• Thank You
• Wedding
• New Years
• Pets
• and many more occasions for any random Thursday afternoon.

NEW SmashUps are added regularly so check back often. So what are you waiting for? Download and start spreading some love right now!


Subscription Details:

Subscribe to SmashUps for unlimited access, saves and sends. Who knew that making people’s day could be so inexpensive. As always, you can cancel anytime.

Your payment will be charged to your account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period, and your account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to that publication, where applicable.


Privacy Policy: https://www.smashups.com/privacy-policy.html

Terms of Service: https://www.smashups.com/terms-of-service.html

title: SmashUps

creator: American Greetings
descriptionHtml:
SmashUps are highly personalized, smile-inducing, shareable videos. Create and send funny, one-of-a-kind videos that will leave your friends and family laughing, smiling, giggling, or amazed in general merriment. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, or just because!

New Celebrity SmashUps featuring Alicia Keys, Christina Aguilera & more! Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays & many other occasions.

• Celebrity friends singing songs and delivering personalized shoutouts that are all about the special people in your life.
• Add a selfie to talking SmashUps and let life-like voices or cute characters deliver your custom message.
• Personalize with names, age, photos, and special interests or whatever you type.
• Make SmashUps for your friends, family, co-workers, the mailman, a stranger on the train, or dog.
• Send SmashUps via Text, Facebook, Twitter, Email and more!
• New videos, celebrities, music, and updates all the time!
• Subscribe to personalize and save unlimited SmashUps videos to your device!

Perfect for holidays and special occasions:
• Halloween
• Thanksgiving
• Christmas
• New Year
• Valentine's Day
• Father's Day
• Mother’s Day
• Birthday
• Congratulations
• Anniversary
• Graduation
• Love
• Thank You
• Wedding
• Baby
• Get Well
• Pets
• St. Patrick's Day
• Easter
• Boss’s Day
• and many more occasions for any random Thursday afternoon.

NEW SmashUps are added regularly so check back often. So what are you waiting for? Download for free and start spreading some love right now!

Subscription Details:

Subscribe to SmashUps for unlimited access, saves and sends. Who knew that making people’s day could be so affordable. As always, you can cancel anytime.

Privacy Policy: https://www.smashups.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Service: https://www.smashups.com/terms-of-service.html

title: SmashUps

creator: American Greetings
descriptionHtml:
SmashUps are highly personalized, smile-inducing, shareable videos. Create and send funny, one-of-a-kind videos that will leave your friends and family laughing, smiling, giggling, or amazed in general merriment. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, or just because!

Celebrity Cameos
Don't just send along your wishes, send them in personalized Dolly Parton video! Or someone else, we won't judge... We've got the best singing, dancing, personalized video celebrity greetings where the stars themselves will actually say your recipient’s name. Check out our new Celebrity SmashUps featuring Alicia Keys, Christina Aguilera & more!

Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays & many other occasions.
